topics.body:
Just _managed_ to get a haircut.
I emphasized the "managed" part because my hair, when left unattended, becomes really long and thick so it's really hard for barbers to cut it.

The barber couldn't use the motorized shaver to cut my hair.
He had to change his scissors and comb TWICE because the last one wasn't big enough.
It took over half an hour to cut it before he can stylize it.
